snippet.title: Bruce Hwy Sunday nightmare: Traffic gridlock after crash
snippet.content:
THE DEPARTMENT of Transport and Main Roads has advised all northbound lanes of the Bruce Hwy have been affected and motorists can expect delays after a single-vehicle rollover.
The crash was reported shortly after 3.30pm, north of Roys Rd.
There were no reported injuries to the driver, but traffic has ground to a crawl northbound from Roys Rd towards Caloundra.
The Department has advised drivers to proceed with caution, with delays expected as the scene is cleared and traffic congestion slowly eases.
